purpose: The email invites applications for a postdoctoral research fellow position at the National University of Singapore (NUS) focusing on agentic AI approaches in software engineering. It highlights the research group's expertise and ongoing projects, particularly the SPARTAN effort on agents. Candidates who have submitted or are about to submit their PhD thesis are encouraged to apply by sending their CV and sample publications.
evidence_sentences: applications are invited for a postdoctoral research fellow position at the National University of Singapore (NUS).
The position will focus on agentic AI approaches towards software engineering.
The group at NUS has research expertise in program repair, fuzzing and symbolic execution.
the post-doc candidate will thus join our SPARTAN effort on agents at NUS.
Only candidates who have submitted PhD thesis or will be submitting soon can be considered.
Interested candidates can email their CV and sample publications to *[log in to unmask]*.
